fastcgi_cache zone_name;
	#default: off, env: http server location, 
fastcgi_cache_path path [levels=number] keys_zone=zone_name:zone_size [inactive=time] [max_size=size];
	#defalut: None, env:http, example: fastcgi_cache_path /data0/fastcgi_cache_dir levels=1:2 keys_zone=cache_one:500m inactive=1d max_size=30g;
fastcgi_cache_methods [GET HEAD POST];
	#default:fastcgi_cache_methods GET HEAD; env: http server location
fastcgi_cache_min_uses the_number;
	#default: fastcgi_cache_min_uses 1; env: http server location.
fastcgi_cache_valid reply_code [reply_code ...] time;
	#default None, env: http server location, example: fastcgi_cache_valid 200 302 10m; fastcgi_cache_valid 404 1m; fastcgi_cache_valid 5m;
	#fastcgi_cache_valid 200 302 10m; fastcgi_cache_valid 301 1h; fastcgi_cache_valid any 1m;
fastcgi_cache_key line;
	#default: None, env: http server location, example: fastcgi_cache_key 127.0.0.1:9000$request_uri;
